question4.choices: Social Media|Smart cars|Healthcare|All of the above

question6.choices: It allows 98.7% of the claims to be paid out in a day.|Damage assessment is done manually to recognize the part name and severity of damage.|It is a car insurance policy.|It can only reduce claim submission time but there’s no anti-leakage engines.

question9.choices: Anti-Fraud Engine|Digital Loan Application|Credit Risk Model|All of the above

question10.qns: Which of the following is not a feature of OneConnect Voice Recognition technology?
question10.choices: Quality voice extraction|Noise detection|Silence detection|Extract a relatively clear voice from a noisy audio file

question11.qns: Which of the following statements about OneConnect Voice Recognition is true?
question11.choices: It is associated with long waiting times and lengthy verification.|It can authenticate a person’s identity within 10 seconds of talk time.|Voiceprints can be impersonated or replicated.|It is not language agnostic.

question14.choices: Transaction data|A timestamp|A hashpoint|All of the above

question15.qns: Which of the following is NOT a benefit of OneConnect Smart Agent?
question15.choices: Lead management tool to unify customer information across channels to provide agents a holistic view of customers.|Digital onboarding solution which is proven to speed up 5x the process and reduce 3x operational costs.|Productivity tool to increase agent productivity by automating manual and repetitive administrative tasks.|It can only support small volume of agents.

question16.qns: The set of technology-based business and financing processes that link buyer, seller, and financing institution in a transaction to lower financing costs and improvebusiness efficiency is?
question16.choices: Supply Chain Financing|Manufacturing Value Chain|Digital Supply Chain|Value Chain Analysis

question17.qns: Which of the following statement about OneConnect’s Micro-Expression technology is correct?
question17.choices: Leveraging the AI-powered sentiment analysis, it is used in reviewing loan applications to analyze fraud-related facial expression such as panic.|It supports a rule-based real-time dynamic questioning strategy based on the responses of the interviewee.|It can be used for interviews for loan applications, allowing banks to remotely assess lending risk where they do not have a physical presence.|All of the above

question18.choices: Cloud-based core system|Smart Lending|Open API Platform|ATM machine
